name: Arcane Archer
description: Arcane Archers blend magic and archery to unleash powerful, enchanted arrows. Originally an elven tradition, these archers are elite warriors who use magic-infused arrows to protect their realms and are skilled in both combat and arcane arts.

arcane_archer_lore.description: You gain proficiency in either the Arcana or Nature skill and learn one cantrip: Prestidigitation or Druidcraft.

arcane_shot.description: You learn two Arcane Shot options and can apply one to your arrow when you hit. You have two uses of this ability, which recharge on a short or long rest. You gain additional options at levels 7, 10, 15, and 18.

7th_level.description: You gain the ability to infuse non-magical arrows with magic to overcome resistance and immunity.

10th_level.description: You gain an additional Arcane Shot option.

15th_level.description: When you roll initiative and have no uses of Arcane Shot remaining, you regain one use.

18th_level.description: Your Arcane Shot options improve with increased damage or additional effects.

banishing_arrow.description: You attempt to banish the target to a harmless location in the Feywild. If the target fails a Charisma saving throw, it is incapacitated and reappears at the end of its next turn.

beguiling_arrow.description: The target takes extra psychic damage and must make a Wisdom saving throw or be charmed by an ally until the start of your next turn.

bursting_arrow.description: The arrow detonates, causing force damage to the target and all creatures within 10 feet.

enfeebling_arrow.description: The target takes extra necrotic damage and its weapon attack damage is halved until the start of your next turn.

grasping_arrow.description: The target is wrapped in poisonous brambles, taking poison damage and slashing damage if it moves. The brambles last for 1 minute or until removed.

piercing_arrow.description: The arrow passes through objects and creatures in a line, ignoring cover. Each creature in the line makes a Dexterity saving throw.

seeking_arrow.description: The arrow seeks out the target, moving around corners and ignoring cover. The target makes a Dexterity saving throw.

shadow_arrow.description: The arrow causes psychic damage and obscures the targetâ€™s vision, making it unable to see beyond 5 feet.
